content:
I just created an account on https://stoat.chat

Has anyone else heard of it? What do you think?

See also https://github.com/stoatchat and https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stoat_(software)
Their website doesn't help explain what it is.
I normally wouldn't like the overloading of the term "servers" but if it's stealing it from Discord I guess that's good.
They should have screenshots. But I guess it's like Discord, which I don't care for in the first place. But better to get people onto a FOSS alternative.
